## [legendry: Enhancing ggplot2 Guides](https://teunbrand.github.io/teunbrand_blog/posts/2024-11-01-legendry-0-1-0/)

By Teun van den Brand

Added Thu Feb 20, 2025

**What is this?**

The **legendry** package extends **ggplot2** by introducing new guide functions, enabling more flexible and customizable legends and axes.
It allows for stacked and composite guides, improving the clarity of visualizations.
